text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1966. ==Events== *6 February - Ulla Pia is selected to represent Denmark at the 1966 Eurovision Song Contest with her song "Stop – mens legen er go'". She is selected to be the tenth Danish Eurovision entry during Dansk Melodi Grand Prix held at the Tivolis Koncertsal in Copenhagen. ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *29 April - Mayianne Dinesen, TV host *5 November - Sofie Stougaard, actress ==Deaths== ==See also== * 1966 in Denmark
title: 1966 in Danish television
